title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru - Episode 5: End of the Golden Witch
original_name: うみねこのなく頃に散 - Episode 5: End of the Golden Witch
sinopse:
Manga adaption of 07th Expansion's popular visual novel.

Now that Beatrice has become a shadow of her former self, Battler has to fight against Lamdbadelta, Bernkastel and Bernkastel's piece called Erika to save her.
